title: Absynth 4 Missing Samples (Mac)
description:
For Mac users:

These are JUST the missing samples (the windows version is ALL Absynth Samples).

This is a Stuffit (.sit) file.

To Install:

Unstuff to any temp directory/folder

Open:

\Library\Application Support\Native Instruments\Absynth 4\Samples\

Move all folders EXCEPT 23 - Preset Samples into that folder (*MAKE SURE* you are NOT overwriting any similarly named folders!!!)

Click the Authenticate button on the nag dialog and enter your password.

Open

\Library\...\Samples\23 - Preset Samples and move the enclosed folders form the comparable folder from these files into it (they will be "Absynth 2" and "Absynth 3") -- you&#039;ll have to deal with the nag again, but so what... that&#039;s mac.

You&#039;re done.

If you used the Native Instruments Komplete.4.Mac.OSX... install, I have checked that these are the only files that are "missing".

If you are a PC user and would like just these files, you can Unstuff this archive with Unstuff/PC (or similar).. Move the directories into:

C:\Program Files\Common Files\Native Instruments\Absynth 4\Samples\ (if memory serves -- be careful not to overwrite anything that might already be there -- like 23 - Preset Samples directory - see above.)

--improvis--
